Making so much sense that that 60km stuff can't even penetrate the rebel ship's shield. The resistance is so stupid that they can only find one safe house for them to hide. Poor Brienne of Tarth!\nAlso\, everything is so familiar including killing the master and \"return\" to the light and battle of \"Hoth\". Star Wars fans are not idiots\, Darth Disney!
